title: A Love That Lurks at the Dining Table - Novel Updates
tags: Caring Protagonist   Cooking   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Misunderstandings   Models   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   R-15   Wealthy Characters   Yandere
author: Inaida Sou   稲井田そう
description: First year high school student Igarashi Mizuka loves cooking. But as soon as she started high school, her parents started working overseas and she had to live alone. Suddenly appearing in front of the lonely Mizuka was Hino Yousuke, a model and actor who asked her to make his meals. Mizuka is bewildered considering his status, but she makes lunches for him and gradually comes to like him…>
